reviews.review: Brilliant game just a shame about the cheaters
Sem comentários para este jogo.... frebre mundial, melhor jogo FPS
I want my money back thank you and goodbye
Классная игра советую всем правда с тех пор как она стала бесплатной она намного изменилась и это круто очень!! Советую всем
Хорошая Игра только Комьюнити всё портят
commu très toxiques mais bon jeux qd meme.

Pros:
-Game is updated regularly.
-Ton of content.
-Polished and competitive gameplay.

Neutral:
-The game has really high skill ceiling that requires you to spend hours on it to become reallly good.


Cons:
-It's easy to hack.
Jogo Nice, pena que tá tendo muito hack -.-
Addictive gameplay, but really really toxic community and a bit fun....
guzel ama gelişmesi hile azaltılması gerek
Нормальная игра , в ней никогда не будет скучно , единственный минус это читеры и плохие тиммейты
Sem duvida o melhor jogo que já joguei
Jogo muito bom, sério, permite comunicação entre jogadores, e tem vários campeonatos dentro do game

Всё круто, но иногда попадаются читеры из-за которых пропадает желание играть.
the most iconic PC game of all time

Do you have a collector's addiction? Well, this game can elevate that even more. You'll also get a very "well-rounded" community, by simply spectating someone who has music blasting into their 5$ microphone.

5/7. needs even more russians in asian servers.
Ебаная помойка,не заходите сюда(выражаю негативные эмоции)
